StudyFlow is a smart study planner that helps you plan exams, schedule study sessions, and revise intelligently using spaced repetition.

Features:
• Subject and chapter management
• Pomodoro and custom study timers
• Spaced repetition revision planning
• Exam tracking with countdown
• Progress charts and statistics
• Quick notes vault
• Fully offline

StudyFlow helps you study smarter, not harder.

Privacy Policy

Last Updated: January 2026

At StudyFlow, we take your privacy seriously. This privacy policy explains how we handle your data.

Data Storage
• All your study data, subjects, chapters, sessions, and notes are stored locally on your device
• We do not collect, transmit, or store any of your personal information on external servers
• Your data never leaves your device unless you explicitly choose to export or backup it

No Internet Connection Required
• StudyFlow works completely offline
• We do not require an internet connection to function
• This ensures your study data remains private

No Tracking or Analytics
• We do not use any analytics, tracking, or advertising services
• We do not collect usage statistics or user behavior data
• Your app usage remains completely private

Export and Backup
• Export and backup features are optional and only work when you explicitly choose to use them
• You have full control over when and where your data is exported
• Exported files are created only on your device or in locations you specify

Data Deletion
• You can delete all your data at any time from the Settings menu
• Deletion is permanent and cannot be undone
• We do not retain any copies of your deleted data

Third-Party Services
• StudyFlow does not integrate with any third-party services
• We do not share your data with any external parties
• Your information remains exclusively on your device

Changes to This Policy
• We may update this privacy policy from time to time
• Any changes will be reflected in the app
• Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy

Contact
• If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please review the app settings

Your privacy is our priority. StudyFlow is designed to be a safe space for your study planning.
